titleStmt.title: The great sacrifice of the new law expounded by the figures of the old
titleStmt.author: Dymock, James, d. 1718?

notesStmt.note: Attributed to James Dymock. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Pages 53-56 are missing in the filmed copy. Pages 40-65 photographed from Union Theological Seminary Library, New York copy and inserted at the end.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
